ygData.subject: Re: Pick on Hot Rod day
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard about the robots in disguise thing a while ago, and boy am I excited. But I hate the idea of the destrons being predicons, they re suppose to be

I heard about the robots in disguise thing a while ago, and boy am I 
excited. But I hate the idea of the destrons being predicons, they're 
suppose to be decepticons. So when they get shipped and tweaked over here, 
I'm going to take out the TM2 predicon symbol, and replace it with a 
decepticon sticker.


>From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Pick on Hot Rod day
>Date: Sat, 21 Apr 2001 21:49:22 -0400
>
>OOC: Well Johnny, its like this, the Japenesse continuity has had so
>many shows and went so far off track from the original Transformers that
>they lost track of what the hell they were doing and pretty much messed
>everything up. This started after they did Transformers: Headmasters.
>Anyway here is what I came up with in my head to fit 'Car Robots' in.
>After the TF race stoped all contact with Earth, the great upgrade
>happaned, and they became Maximals and Predacons. After Beast Wars Neo,
>a group of Predacons(Destron/Destronger in Japan) went back in time, to
>Earth. Why? We dont know. Anyway Optimus Prime(Fire Convoy) and the last
>Autobots followed. What I dont gat is why the original TF's arn't in it.
>It is in 2000, so it would be 5 years before Tf: The Movie.
>
>Things are going to get wierder because in a few months America is going
>to 'car' TF's again. A new toy line called TF: Robots in Desquise will
>be released. Also 'Car Robots' will be inported, and tweaked a little so
>it fits the American continuity. It will probably have Predacons, after
>Beast Machines, going to Earth, and finding that the last Autobots were
>hiding there. They will probably change the year 2000 thing and set in a
>appropriat year. Well I hope I cleared things up, although I probably
>confused you even more.
